column5: Very charming backyard cottage in a great location, close to UT and walkable to cafes & bars. Beautiful inside and out. It is located in an enclosed private backyard with a fish pond. The cottage has a screened in porch and lots of windows and skylights to the tree canopy. The sofa in the living can fold out to a bed. There is a claw foot bath tub & shower in the spacious bathroom. From the queen-size bed enjoy the windows to the garden or watch TV.
column8: Charming Cottage, Great Location, Fish Pond
